quote: "You see things and say 'Why?', but I dream things and say 'Why not?'"
"Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm"
"All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them"
"I have not failed. I've just found 10.000 ways that won't work"
"In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity"
"Twenty years from now, you'll be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do"
"My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time"
"It always seems impossible until it's done"
"Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much"
"A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement"
"It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop"
"Tell me, and I'll forget. Teach me, and I'll remember. Involve me, and I'll learn"
"All human actions have one or more of these seven causes: chance, nature, compulsion, habit, reason, passion, and desir"
